name: Emilie
desc:
"A Thousand Scents Traced" Emilie

Like fragrance fading, like mist dissipating.

value.text: Reward for inviting Emilie to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Emilie
value.desc: A Fontainian perfumer, one who bottles secrets.

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc:
"A Thousand Scents Traced" Emilie

Like fragrance fading, like mist dissipating.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Thank you for this invitation. It'll be an honor to see your card-playing skills."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Emilie's deck focuses on Summons and Burning reactions, and is geared towards triggering Burning reactions to deal significant damage.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc:
"A Thousand Scents Traced" Emilie

Like fragrance fading, like mist dissipating.

customize.name: Klee
customize.desc:
"Fleeing Sunlight" Klee

Every card you draw may bring in an "explosive surprise."

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc:
"Beyond Mortality" Baizhu

Living with many maladies, where will one find a cure?

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc:
"A Thousand Scents Traced" Emilie

Like fragrance fading, like mist dissipating.

customize.name: Marcotte Sillage
customize.desc:
Emilie: Marcotte Sillage

"A little ambience."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Marcotte Sillage
customize.desc:
Emilie: Marcotte Sillage

"A little ambience."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Your skills are outstanding, unpredictable yet synergistic... It seems I'll have to think outside the box."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Emilie" starts with the Talent Card "Marcotte Sillage" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 1 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , summons <color=#ffffff>Lumidouce Case: Level 3</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your Burning Flame enters play:</color> After the next time either side uses a Skill, trigger 1 instance of <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame's</color> End of Round effect. (Twice per Round)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After you deal Burning reaction DMG:</color> This card levels up to become <color=#ffffff>Lumidouce Case: Level 2</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color> (Can stack. Max 6 stacks.)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color> (Can stack. Max 6 stacks.)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> to all opponents.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that greants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Burning Flame</color>
<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
